patthana15.19:4.1: Hetuṃ atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naatītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.19:5.1: Hetuṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.19:6.1: Hetuṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu napaccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
